entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
